verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H5489>Red<s%> <S%H6290>sea<s%>, between Paran, and <S%H8603>Tophel<s%>, and <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, and <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>, and <S%H1774>Dizahab<s%>.
(There are <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' journey from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6947>Kadesh<s%>–barnea.)

And it came to pass in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according unto all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had given him in commandment unto <S%H6680>them<s%>;

<S%H310>After<s%> he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H6252>Astaroth<s%> in <S%H154>Edrei<s%>:
On this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto us in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, You have <S%H3427>lived<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%> in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>:

<S%H6437>Turn<s%>, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and unto all the places <S%H7934>near<s%> to <S%H6160>it<s%>, in the plain, in the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>valley<s%>, and in the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>side<s%>, to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and unto <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>: go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.
And I <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> you myself <S%H905>alone<s%>:
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3117>you<s%>, and, behold, you are this day as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

(The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> make you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> so many more <S%H3254>as<s%> you <S%H1288>are<s%>, and bless <S%H1696>you<s%>, as he has promised you!)
<S%H349>How<s%> can I myself alone <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H2960>encumbrance<s%>, and your <S%H4853>burden<s%>, and your <S%H7379>strife<s%>?

<S%H3051>Take<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them rulers over <S%H7218>you<s%>.
And you <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>, and said, The <S%H1697>thing<s%> which you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for us to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over <S%H8269>you<s%>, captains over <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H2572>fifties<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H6235>tens<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the cases between your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> between every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and the stranger that is with <S%H1616>him<s%>.

You shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; but you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> as well as the <S%H1419>great<s%>; you shall not be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%>; for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>'s: and the <S%H1697>cause<s%> that is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> for <S%H7126>you<s%>, bring it unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and I will hear it.
And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> which you should <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And when we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, we went <S%H3212>through<s%> all that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, which you <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H935>us<s%>; and we came to <S%H6947>Kadesh<s%>–barnea.
And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>you<s%>, You are come unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> does give unto <S%H5414>us<s%>.

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5927>you<s%>: go up and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>, as the Lord <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>you<s%>; fear <S%H2865>not<s%>, neither be discouraged.

And you came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto me every one of <S%H559>you<s%>, and said, We will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2658>us<s%>, and they shall search us out the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by what <S%H1870>way<s%> we must go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and into what <S%H5892>cities<s%> we shall <S%H935>come<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> pleased me <S%H3190>well<s%>: and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H259>you<s%>, one of a <S%H376>tribe<s%>:
And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and searched it <S%H7270>out<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and brought it <S%H3381>down<s%> unto <S%H7725>us<s%>, and brought us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> does give <S%H5414>us<s%>.
Nevertheless you <S%H14>would<s%> not go <S%H5927>up<s%>, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>:

And you <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> <S%H3318>us<s%>, he has brought us forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, to destroy <S%H8045>us<s%>.

Where shall we go <S%H5927>up<s%>? our <S%H251>brothers<s%> have <S%H4549>discouraged<s%> our <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> than <S%H5892>we<s%>; the cities are <S%H1419>great<s%> and walled <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and moreover we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the Anakims <S%H6062>there<s%>.
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6206>you<s%>, Dread <S%H3372>not<s%>, neither be afraid of them.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3898>you<s%>, he shall fight for <S%H6213>you<s%>, according to all that he did for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

And in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, where you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> how that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H376>you<s%>, as a man does <S%H5375>carry<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>went<s%>, until you <S%H935>came<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Yet in this <S%H1697>thing<s%> you did not <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>,

Who <S%H1980>went<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8446>you<s%>, to search you out a <S%H4725>place<s%> to pitch your <S%H2583>tents<s%> <S%H784>in<s%>, in fire by <S%H3915>night<s%>, to <S%H7200>show<s%> you by what <S%H1870>way<s%> you should <S%H3212>go<s%>, and in a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words<s%>, and was <S%H7107>angry<s%>, and <S%H7650>swore<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Surely there shall not <S%H376>one<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>,

<S%H2108>Save<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>; he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>, and to him will I give the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he has trodden <S%H1869>upon<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, because he has <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Also the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, You also shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>there<s%>.

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, which <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>, he shall go in <S%H2388>there<s%>: encourage <S%H3478>him<s%>: for he shall cause Israel to inherit <S%H5157>it<s%>.

Moreover your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, which you <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, which in that <S%H3117>day<s%> had no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>, they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5414>there<s%>, and unto them will I give <S%H3423>it<s%>, and they shall possess it.
But as for <S%H6437>you<s%>, turn, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Then you <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2398>me<s%>, We have sinned against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, we will go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%>, according to all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2296>us<s%>. And when you had put on every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, you were <S%H1951>ready<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Say unto <S%H5927>them<s%>, Go not up, neither <S%H3898>fight<s%>; for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5062>you<s%>; lest you be struck <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H8085>you<s%>; and you would not hear, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%>.

And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>lived<s%> in that <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7291>you<s%>, and chased <S%H1682>you<s%>, as bees <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> you in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, even unto <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>.

And you <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor give ear unto <S%H238>you<s%>.
So you <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, according unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you lived <S%H3427>there<s%>.
